name: See you next FALL!
description:
Frederick Fallington had hiked to the great peak of Mount Disastrophy where one unfortunate misstep has lead to a grand plummet! It is now the player's responsibility to help poor Fred fall as far as he can as fast he can. But beware! There are big rocks to dodge and the more momentum Fred accumulates, the less control he has as he tumbles down the mountainside!

If Frederick crashes into enough rocks, he will slow to a stop resulting in a game over.

Use the up and down arrow keys to switch lanes (hint: watch the shadow)

Press Esc to exit the game

Created by Plummeteer Studios!

Lead Designer - Aiden

Lead Programmer - Robert

Character Artist - Perci

Background and Prop Artist - Cat

and Executive Producer - Kendrick
